subNodes.conversationText: root
Well, well, look what we have here...lost adventures.
Actually, we know exactly where we are, thank you.
Things have changed, you've entered our territory now.
Your territory?  What are you?  A king with one ugly follower?
Who you calling ugly, you freakishly redheaded elf.
Continue
King?  No...we're pirates...take from the rich, give to the poor...the poor being us, of course.
Continue
Anyway, I suggest you feeble looking lassies drop your valuables and scamper off to your mommies.
Continue
Feeble lassies? I must assume you made that comment before noticing me, over here. Either way, I think we should teach these petty pilferers a lesson.
Ease up there, Fledge.  I'm sure they are just trying to scare us, they're not really looking for a fight.
On the contrary, we intend to claim your valuables, preferable after easily dispatching of you.

[Intimidate] I'm sorry, you must have us confused with some other group because we can easily kick your derrières.  Now, I suggest you run away before we give your head a new home where the sun don't shine.
[Success] Easy there, brute.  You can keep your stuff.  Tell you what, you can borrow our boat, if you would like.
Continue
There are some pesky Forest Gnolls across the river that could use your attention.
Fine, we'll go check it out.
[Failed] Ooh, we're scared.  We'll see how tough you really are.  Let's get 'em, Grack.
Continue
[Diplomacy] I believe we're actually doing you a favor.  All these kobolds must be bad for business.
[Success] In that case, maybe you guys are alright.  As long as you're exterminating pests, there are some annoying Forest Gnolls across the river.
Continue
You can borrow our boat as long as you bring it back.
Thanks, we'll go check it out.
[Failed] Sorry, we don't need any favors or 'friends'.  Let's get 'em, Grack.
Continue
Here, you can have our equipment, just leave us be.
Ha, this is going to be too easy.  I think we'll kill you first then take your goods, if it is all the same to you.
Continue
<watching intently>

[Intimidate] I'm sorry, you must have us confused with some other group because we can easily kick your derrières.  Now, I suggest you run away before we give your head a new home where the sun don't shine.
[Diplomacy] I believe we're actually doing you a favor.  All these kobolds must be bad for business.
Here, you can have our equipment, just leave us be.
Your territory?  Big words from such an ugly half breed?
Who you calling ugly, little dwarf.
Continue
King?  No...we're pirates...take from the rich, give to the poor...the poor being us, of course.
Continue
Anyway, I suggest you feeble looking lassies drop your valuables and scamper off to your mommies.
We're not certain, can you help us?
We can help by lightening your load.  Why don't you feeble looking lassies just leave us your valuables and scamper off to your mommies.
Continue
